fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Wake up a target at night. Costs 2 sun. If you do not use this, you will instead produce 1 sun.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
The target will receive a buff depending on their alignment for the following night, and they will know this.
Killing: Attack will rise one tier.
Production: Double the sun production.
Protection: If the role successfully protects someone, the attacker will be dealt a Powerful attack.
Support: Their ability may be used for half the sun.
(if another alignment is added, accent should dm me)
